name: A Long Walk Home (hacked.design)
description:
The enemy weren't supposed to be active in this area. Hell, all you were trying to do was transport your little repair mech, barely even equipped for combat, across areas of operation. Missile Warnings. Explosions. Your transport drone crashes into the nearby canyon. Now you and your little repair mech have a long walk back to friendly lines.

A Long Walk Home was created for Mech Jam III https://itch.io/jam/mechjam3 and is the spiritual sequel to A Long Night's Work: https://hackeddesign.itch.io/a-long-nights-work

Controls

Movement - WASD, Arrow Keys, or Numpad

Aim - Mouse

Primary Fire/Attack - Mouse Button 1

Secondary Fire/Attack - Mouse Button 1

Change Primary Weapon - Mouse Scroll Wheel

Change Secondary Weapon - [ ], -+

Inventory/Loadout - I

Repair - R

Overdrive - O, Shift

Coolant Dump - C, Enter or NumPad Enter

Fire Nose Weapon - 1

Fire Right Arm Weapon - 2

Fire Left Arm Weapon - 3

Fire Right Shoulder Weapon - 4

Fire Left Shoulder Weapon - 5

Pause/Quit - Escape

Credits

Title Font - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bungee+Hairline

Base/Environment Models, Mini Square font,  SoundFX, along with some UI and Particle assets from https://www.kenney.nl/ free assets.
